CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM and the processing solvent have been carefully optimized.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a material name.
2. PC71BM: This is also a material name.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM and the processing solvent have been carefully optimized.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a specific compound or material. It can be considered as a "Property" in the context of having a weight ratio with another material.
2. PC71BM: Similar to PSFDTBT, this is also a specific compound or material.
3. weight ratio: This is a property or characteristic of the materials PSFDTBT and PC71BM in relation to each other.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "weight ratio" and the specific materials "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The weight ratio (property) of PSFDTBT and PC71BM.

So, the only relevant entity is "weight ratio" and the materials "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM" that have this property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| weight ratio |

| Materials |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM and the processing solvent have been carefully optimized.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a specific compound or material. In this context, it can be considered as a "Property Value Entity" representing the value of the material PSFDTBT.
2. PC71BM: Similar to PSFDTBT, PC71BM is also a specific compound or material. It is another "Property Value Entity" representing the value of the material PC71BM.
3. weight ratio: This is a property or characteristic of the materials PSFDTBT and PC71BM in relation to each other. It can be considered as a "Property Value Entity" representing the value of the weight ratio between PSFDTBT and PC71BM.
4. processing solvent: This is another material or compound used in the processing. It is a "Property Value Entity" representing the value of the processing solvent.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. weight ratio (between PSFDTBT and PC71BM): This is a property or characteristic of the materials PSFDTBT and PC71BM in relation to each other, specifically their weight ratio. It is a "Property Value Entity" representing the value of the weight ratio between PSFDTBT and PC71BM.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| weight ratio (between PSFDTBT and PC71BM) |
